references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRF, a foundational work in neural rendering that this paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian splatting, the core method this paper enhances and extends.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduced Mip-NeRF, a significant advancement in NeRF that addresses anti-aliasing, a challenge also tackled in this paper.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper introduced Instant-NGP, a highly efficient neural rendering method that achieves real-time performance, a goal also pursued by this paper.
This paper introduced anisotropic spherical Gaussians (ASGs), a key component of this paper's novel approach to improve the accuracy of 3D Gaussian splatting.
